message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to keep my investment within $10000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12000?
I understand you're looking to keep your investment within $10000, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about we compromise at $16000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Could we perhaps settle on $14000?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to meet my minimum price. How about we meet at $17000?
